meanings.sent1: The ship sailed on, flagless and unnoticed.
meanings.sent2: The flagless pole stood bare in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The flagless birthday party felt incomplete without decorations.
meanings.sent4: The flagless garden seemed to lack a touch of color and cheer.
meanings.sent5: The flagless hill was a lonely sight against the blue sky.

meanings.sent1: The flagless country had no symbol to represent it.
meanings.sent2: The flagless building looked plain and unadorned.
meanings.sent3: The flagless parade confused the spectators who expected to see banners.
meanings.sent4: The flagless team played with unity despite the lack of a common emblem.
meanings.sent5: The flagless sky seemed vast and endless above the empty field.
